mapper.insert: insert into order_item (id , order_id, product_id, sku_id, batch_id, trip_id, create_time, update_time, is_deleted) values (#{id}, #{orderId}, #{productId}, #{skuId}, #{batchId}, #{tripId}, now(), now(), 0)
mapper.select: select oi.id, oi.order_id, oi.product_id, oi.sku_id, oi.batch_id, oi.trip_id, oi.create_time, oi.update_time, oi.is_deleted, ti.name as trip_name, ti.id_card_no as trip_card_no, ti.sex, ti.age_type from order_item oi left join trip_info ti on oi.trip_id = ti.id where oi.order_id = #{orderId} and oi.is_deleted = 0 order by id desc
